00041 namespace sc_core {
00042 
00043 class SC_API sc_event;
00044 class SC_API sc_module;
00045 class sc_phase_callback_registry;
00046 class sc_runnable;
00047 class SC_API sc_simcontext;

00051 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 //  CLASS : sc_object
00053 //
00054 //  Abstract base class of all SystemC `simulation' objects.
00055 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 
00057 class SC_API sc_object 
00058 {
00059     friend class sc_event;
00060     friend class sc_module;
00061     friend struct sc_invoke_method;
00062     friend class sc_module_dynalloc_list;
00063     friend class sc_object_manager;
00064     friend class sc_phase_callback_registry;
00065     friend class sc_process_b;
00066     friend class sc_runnable;
00067     friend class sc_simcontext;
00068     friend class sc_trace_file_base;
00069 
00070 public:
00071     typedef unsigned phase_cb_mask;
00072 
00073     const char* name() const
00074         { return m_name.c_str(); }
00075 
00076     const char* basename() const;
00077 
00078     virtual void print(::std::ostream& os=::std::cout ) const;
00079 
00080     // dump() is more detailed than print()
00081     virtual void dump(::std::ostream& os=::std::cout ) const;
00082 
00083     virtual void trace( sc_trace_file* tf ) const;
00084 
00085     virtual const char* kind() const { return "sc_object"; }
00086 
00087     sc_simcontext* simcontext() const
00088         { return m_simc; }
00089 
00090     // add attribute
00091     bool add_attribute( sc_attr_base& );
00092 
00093     // get attribute by name
00094           sc_attr_base* get_attribute( const std::string& name_ );
00095     const sc_attr_base* get_attribute( const std::string& name_ ) const;
00096 
00097     // remove attribute by name
00098     sc_attr_base* remove_attribute( const std::string& name_ );
00099 
00100     // remove all attributes
00101     void remove_all_attributes();
00102 
00103     // get the number of attributes
00104     int num_attributes() const;
00105 
00106     // get the attribute collection
00107           sc_attr_cltn& attr_cltn();
00108     const sc_attr_cltn& attr_cltn() const;
00109 
00110     virtual const std::vector<sc_event*>& get_child_events() const
00111         { return m_child_events; }
00112 
00113     virtual const std::vector<sc_object*>& get_child_objects() const
00114         { return m_child_objects; }
00115 
00116     sc_object* get_parent() const;
00117     sc_object* get_parent_object() const { return m_parent; }
00118 
00119 protected:
00120 
00121     sc_object();
00122     sc_object(const char* nm);
00123 
00124     sc_object( const sc_object& );
00125     sc_object& operator=( const sc_object& );
00126 
00127 
00128     virtual ~sc_object();
00129 
00130     virtual void add_child_event( sc_event* event_p );
00131     virtual void add_child_object( sc_object* object_p );
00132     virtual bool remove_child_event( sc_event* event_p );
00133     virtual bool remove_child_object( sc_object* object_p );
00134 
00135     phase_cb_mask register_simulation_phase_callback( phase_cb_mask );
00136     phase_cb_mask unregister_simulation_phase_callback( phase_cb_mask );
00137 
00138     class hierarchy_scope;
00139 
00140 private:
00141             void do_simulation_phase_callback();
00142     virtual void simulation_phase_callback();
00143 
00144     void detach();
00145     virtual void orphan_child_events();
00146     virtual void orphan_child_objects();
00147     void sc_object_init(const char* nm);
00148 
00149 private:
00150 
00151     /* Each simulation object is associated with a simulation context */ 
00152     mutable sc_attr_cltn*   m_attr_cltn_p;   // attributes for this object.
00153     std::vector<sc_event*>  m_child_events;  // list of child events.
00154     std::vector<sc_object*> m_child_objects; // list of child objects.
00155     std::string             m_name;          // name of this object.
00156     sc_object*              m_parent;        // parent for this object.
00157     sc_simcontext*          m_simc;          // simcontext ptr / empty indicator
00158 };
00159 
00160 inline
00161 sc_object&
00162 sc_object::operator=( sc_object const & )
00163 {
00164   // deliberately do nothing
00165   return *this;
00166 }
00167 
00168 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00169 
00170 extern const char SC_HIERARCHY_CHAR;
00171 extern bool sc_enable_name_checking;
00172 
00173 
00174 inline 
00175 sc_object* sc_get_parent( const sc_object* obj_p ) 
00176 { 
00177         return obj_p->get_parent_object(); 
00178 }
00179 
00180 } // namespace sc_core
